thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Penny

author: Penny
title: Penny
text: Thriftbooks.com allows you the opportunity to buy used books for a fraction of the cost. I've been able to find books 50% off or more, then what my local used bookstore charges for then. And the 4 for $12 thrift books are an absolute steal! Plus free shipping with a $10 purchase. The only downside is the wait. Books are sent media mail by USPS so it takes 7-14 days on average for your shipment to arrive. The savings is worth the wait though.
